# makerworld-api-reverse

Unofficial MakerWorld API reverse engineering toolkit for Node.js/TypeScript.

## Canonical Docs

- README: ./README.md
- Manual: ./docs/MANUAL.md
- API: ./docs/API.md
- Reason codes: ./docs/REASON_CODES.md
- Changelog policy: ./docs/CHANGELOG_POLICY.md
- Roadmap: ./docs/ROADMAP.md
- Full LLM context: ./docs/llms-full.txt

## Core Guarantees

- Non-throwing typed outcomes for resolver/downloader operations.
- API-first resolution with __NEXT_DATA__ fallback.
- Additive-first compatibility policy.
- Conservative compliance messaging; unofficial project.
